mapper.select: SELECT id, member_card memberCard, m_grade_id mGradeId, m_grade_name mGradeName, create_time createTime FROM member_grade_record WHERE member_card = #{memberCard}
mapper.insert: insert into member_grade_record (id, member_card, m_grade_id, m_grade_name, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mGradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mGradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into member_grade_record
id,
member_card,
m_grade_id,
m_grade_name,
before_grade_id,
before_grade_name,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mGradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mGradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beforeGradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beforeGradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update member_grade_record
member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_grade_id = #{mGradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_grade_name = #{mGradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
